title: I got LeaverBuster for my game crashing
body: I got LeaverBuster for my game crashing twice and i miss playing with my friends.

replies.body: Hey, that sucks that your game keeps crashing.  :(  I want to get you back in-game with your friends, but need some more info!  What do you mean by crash exactly?  When is it happening, and are there any error messages?  In the meantime, it may be best to stick to custom games while this gets worked out.
like my game would launch normally and i would be able to lock in a champion and when i would spawn my game would crash.

It's hard to diagonose the situation because 'crash' could mean so many different things.  Assuming that this crash involves a bugsplat error,  you can try our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help rule out some possibilities.  I hope that helps!
well my game works fine now it's just I can't play online with friends or random people because of the LeaverBuster so what can I do to fix my game. :|
